p: To improve the accuracy of phylogenetic inference, we excluded ( i) recombinant regions, determined using BootScanning in the RDP package [36], [37], ( ii) multiple sequences from single individuals, ( iii) sequences containing frame-shift mutations, and ( iv) ambiguously aligned regions. Sequences containing frame-shifts were removed to accommodate codon-partitioning models in our phylogenetic analyses. Alignments were performed using Clustal X [38] and manually cleaned in Se-al ( http://tree.bio.ed.ac.uk/software/seal/). SIVsm/HIV-2 and SIVcpz/HIV-1 alignments are provided as supporting information ( Datasets S1, S2, S3, S4, S5, S6).
